steps.title: Welcome to Texas Hold'em
steps.message: Texas Hold'em is the most popular form of poker today. Each player gets 2 private cards and uses them with 5 shared cards to make the best 5-card hand.

steps.title: The Betting Rounds
steps.message: Each hand has 4 rounds: Preflop, Flop, Turn, and River. Players can bet, raise, or fold in each round.

steps.title: How to Win
